Question: BE GREEN CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Be Green

CES 2024 Product Highlights

- Solar panels for energy transition
- Energetic renovation solutions
- Mobility solutions to support sustainability
- Indoor solar cell technology by Ambient Photonics
- Product carbon tracker integration with electronic shelf labels and POS systems by GreenSwapp

Specifications

- Focus on recycling plastics and metals into new products
- Development of low-light indoor solar cells
- Implementation of product carbon tracking technology
Summary_cn:
沉浸式太阳能，提供清洁能源
可再生能源解决方案
可持续发展的移动解决方案
Ambient Photonics 室内太阳能电池技术
GreenSwapp 的产品碳追踪集成于电子标签和POS系统

规格

专注于将塑料和金属回收再利用
开发适用于低光条件下的室内太阳能电池
实施产品碳追踪技术
